multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a pink, non-painful bump on the side of my neck that bleeds sometimes when touched.
How long have you had this bump on your neck?
It grew to its current size in the past week.
Have you noticed any changes in your skin elsewhere on your body?
No, there are no other similar lesions seen on my body.

No, I have no history of skin cancer.
Are you currently taking any medications or have any other medical conditions?
I am currently taking oral contraceptives, but I don't have any other medical conditions.
Final Diagnosis: Pyogenic Granuloma.
